name: Slap Happy Scientist
description:
Taylor Buchheit made Slap Happy Scientist as part of the KrassJam. He had never used PICO-8 or Lua before so this was purely a learning experience. Unfortunately, the game isn't finished, but the idea is there: You are a scientist who  annoys town guards by slapping them!

To move use the arrow keys. Press z to sprint and x to SLAP.
